title: Featured Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB User

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I land on the home page
AND games are available for today's date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will see a featured game
NOTE: sometime SLIVE an FLIVE content (VOD and SVOD clips) can be pushed to the featured/hero space as well. This is also expected.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I land on the home page
AND more than 1 game is available for today's date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see the the “non-featured” games as a carousel under the featured game.

title: Game States- pregame/warm-up/live/final/delayed/postponed (automated)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB User is on the Home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is in the pregame state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user can see the Featured Game with pregame details

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is in the warm-up state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will notify the user the game is in warmup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is in the live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user can see the Featured Game with live details

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is in the final state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user can see the Featured Game with final details

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is delayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will notify the user the game is delayed with a reason

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is postponed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will notify the user the game is in postponed

title: Carousels ordering
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a list of playlists to be displayed on the homepage as carousel items
custom_expected: THEN they playlists are kept in the same order as the original list of playlists (original list can be viewed at https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/video/v1/playlist )

title: Play SVOD
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled MLB user is in MLB.TV App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN They click on an SVOD tile
AND are entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Play the SVOD content in the new Video player.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they have already watched part of an SVOD Video
AND they click to go back in to resume watching
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN play the SVOD Video from the previous book marked position

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they are watching an SVOD Video
AND closed Captions are available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user can turn CC on and see them on screen.

title: Postponed game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user on the Homepage

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I select a game that is postponed on the day that it is postponed
(Example: on Aug 9th, 2024 TEX @ NYY e was postponed. Examples will need to be updated over time. Please contact MLB if the current example is on longer available)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should receive messaging that there are "No Broadcasts Available"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I attempt to play a live/archived game in the games carousel that was previously postponed
(Example: the game from step 1 was rescheduled to Aug 10th, 2024)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the feed should be selectable
AND the feed should play when selected

title: No Games today During Season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there are no games for a given day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN vod will be featured

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there are no games returned from the playlist
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN vod will be featured

title: Featured Game: Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the homepage
NOTE: Proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached json to simulate a blackout in the featured spot

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the featured game is blacked out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a blackout icon is displayed in the featured spot

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured game is blacked out
AND I click the Watch Live button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the the blackout messaging modal is displayed

title: Featured Game: Feed Select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled MLB user is in MLB.TV App
NOTE: If appropriate games are not available for the day, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi_live_game_simulated_in_hero.json to simulate live game and yesterdaysMastCall.json to simulate an archived game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN my favorite/following team is the featured game 
AND I select the watch the game button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN then autoplay the game with my favorite/following team feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a non favorite/following team is the featured game 
AND I select the watch the game button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN then autoplay the home team’s feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a featured game is in the archive state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show the recap button if available

title: Featured Game: YouTube Game of the Week
custom_preconds: Given a user on the homepage

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Featured Game is the YouTube Free Game of the Week
AND the stream for the game is not yet available

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test step, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi_youtube_pregame_in_hero.json
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "This MLB Broadcast is available on YouTube" message should display over the Featured Game
AND no "Watch Live" button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Featured Game is the YouTube Free Game of the Week
AND the stream is available/live

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test step, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi_youtube_live_game_in_hero.json
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Live on YouTube - Watch Free" message should display over the Featured Game 
AND "Watch Live" button should be displayed with YouTube icon included

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN "Watch Live" YouTube button is pressed
AND YouTube is installed on the device

NOTE: Continued from step 2
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be redirected to YouTube app
AND the game should play in YouTube

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN "Watch Live" YouTube button is pressed
AND YouTube is NOT installed on the device

NOTE: Continued from step 2
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the use should be redirected to the app store page for YouTube

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Featured Game is the YouTube Free Game of the Week
AND the game has been archived

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test step, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_youtube_final_in_hero.json file available at this link (too large to attach):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Q_htji0i-Zlv8SIjYfQfGNAWEUCZihaM/view?usp=sharing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game displays in the app as a normal archived game

title: Team personalized Carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN an  MLB user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN they land on the homepage
AND they have a favorite team set
custom_expected: THEN I should see a carousel of VOD specific to my favorite team

title: Support 0-1 Games
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled MLB user is in MLB.TV App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there is only 1 game in a given Day
(use the attached oneGame.json file to proxy the mast epg endpoint to simulate this)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN  I can see the game in the hero space
AND I no longer see the games carousel at the top of the page
AND the games carousel appears as the last carousel on the homepage with the message "There are no other games scheduled"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there no games in a given Day
(use the attached noGamesMast.json file to proxy the mast epg endpoint to simulate this)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN  I can see VOD/SVOD content in the hero space
AND I no longer see the games carousel at the top of the page
AND the games carousel appears as the last carousel on the homepage with the message "There are no other games scheduled"

title: Live Indicator on Content
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the homepage

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user can see a featured game in live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a live badge is present for that media

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user can see a game in the games carousel in live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a live badge is present for that media

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user can see an adhoc live feed (such as Bettor's Eye) in the hero space
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a live badge is present for that media

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user can see an adhoc live feed (such as Bettor's Eye) in a carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a live badge is present for that media

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user can see an SVOD live feed (such as Big Inning) in the hero space
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a live badge is present for that media

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user can see an SVOD live feed (such as Big Inning) in a carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a live badge is present for that media

title: Live VOD/SVOD in hero play from the live point
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the hero spot is populated by Live VOD/SVOD content
AND I click the "Watch Live" button
custom_expected: THEN the media should play from the live point

title: Homepage: Archived Game Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled MLB user is in MLB.TV App

NOTE: The archived carousel is controlled by the content team. You should only see it on the homepage if it is listed in this playlist: https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/video/v1/playlist. If it is not listed in this playlist, please mark this test case as "Not-Applicable."

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the archived game
AND it’s the user’s favorite team feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN go into the favorite team stream from the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the archived game
AND it’s NOT the user’s favorite team feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN go into the home team stream from the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects an archived game
AND the game has a video bookmark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN start the stream from the bookmark position

title: Apple TV pregame in hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user
custom_steps:
NOTE:
for test step 1
proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_pregame_apple_game.json file available at this link(too big to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P3bmwhajDIFG9ugGjW-MSNpsTWTq9OY3/view?usp=sharing
for test steps 2 and 3 proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_pregame_apple_game_with_pregame_show.json available at this link(too big to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sGY-K1Dg7-l2nNz9TV333iG-pDwXzdRw/view?usp=sharing
AND proxy https://statsapi.mlb.com:443/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=633152&hydrate=broadcasts%28all%29%2Cteam%2Cgame%28content%28media%28epg%29%29%29%2Clinescore%28%29&useLatestGames=false with the attached statsapi_pregame_apple_game_with_pregame_show_gamePk633152.json

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is in the hero
AND the game is in a pregame state with no feeds available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN display the "Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge
AND no Watch Live button is available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is in the hero
AND the game is in a pregame state
AND pregame is available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN display the "Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge
AND display the pregame messaging
AND display the LIVE badge
AND display the Watch Live on Apple TV+ button

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is in the hero
AND the game is in a pregame state
AND the Watch Live on Apple TV+ button is clicked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display the You're a bit early! modal

title: Apple TV live in hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: to simulate the conditions for this test, use the qa environment and proxy https://mastapi.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached qaAaplleInHero.json file
custom_steps:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is in the hero
AND the game is live

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is in the hero
AND the game is live
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge is displayed
AND the Live badge is displayed
AND the "Watch on Apple TV+ button" is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Watch on Apple TV+ button"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN display the Apple+ messaging modal
AND a feed selection is available to attempt entering the feed in the modal

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in a blacked out country 
AND the user selects the feed selection option in the Apple TV+ modal 

NOTE: Testing this step will require a feed on qa or in prod with the correct media rights messaging associated with it.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the media player opens
AND Apple TV+ specific messaging error is displayed in the player

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in a non-blacked out country 
AND the user is entitled
AND the user selects the feed selection option in the Apple TV+ modal

NOTE: Testing this step will require a feed on qa or in prod with the correct media rights messaging associated with it.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play

title: Apple TV archived in hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the mastapi_archived_apple_game_in_hero.json file, available at this link (too large to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c-HevUZYDdswloh4mVHAvBSKTsLczir5/view?usp=sharing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the hero
AND the game is in an archived state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN display the game as a regular archived game
AND the Appletv+ badge should no longer appear

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the hero
AND the game is in an archived state 
AND the user presses the Watch Full Game button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game plays

title: Mixed Content in Games Carousel- Charles required if not readily available
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the homepage

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the mast response includes featured content
AND the featured content is set to hero: true
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the featured content should be displayed in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the mast response includes featured content
AND the featured content is set to hero: false
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the featured content should be displayed in the first position in the games carousel

title: Hero Space- Game Watch Live Behavior- Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
ADN the user does not have hide spoilers active
AND a live game is featured in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Watch Live button in the hero space
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will start from the live point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user leaves a live game entered from the hero space via the Watch Live button
AND the user selects the Watch Live button in the hero space again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will start from the live point

title: Hero Space- Live Game Watch Live Button behavior- Hide Spoilers On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND hide spoilers is enabled
AND there is a live game in the hero space
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Watch Live button from the hero space
custom_expected: THEN start the game from the broadcast start point (fallback to the beginning if the broadcast start point can’t be found)

title: Hero- Long title wraps
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the hero is displayed
AND a long title for the hero content is present

NOTE: To create the conditions required to test this, proxy the mast EPG with the attached milbInHeroMast.json file and proxy the true	https://dapi.mlbinfra.com:443/v2/content/en-us/vsmcontents/milb-game-of-the-day	enpoint with the attached milbGameLongTitle.json

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN text is long enough
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN text should wrap and push the remaining content down

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN text spans 3 lines
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show 3 lines of text AND continue to push content down

title: Live game in hero for Logged out user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged out user
AND a live game is present in the hero
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Watch Live button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is presented with a modal with options to "Login" or "Get MLB.TV" 
("Create Free Account" would replace "Get MLB.TV" if the game is a Free Game of the Day)
